scripts.setup: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run build:shared
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules contracts/node_modules shared/node_modules && rimraf frontend/build backend/dist shared/dist
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:contracts
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:contracts
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npx serve -s build"
